title: Gibo (Stepmother's Sin)
synopsis: Yusuke's been very naughty. He's seduced his father's fiancee; transforming her into a debased slave to his own twisted desires. But as his hold on her tightens, his sanity slips, and the forbidden family fun descends into a nightmare of lust! Trapped in madness of their own creation, they will pay the ultimate price for a stepmother's sin!
staff: [['Yoshida, Tomohiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Nishi, Shigenari', ['Editing']], ['Seki, Mieko', ['Color Setting', ' Color Design']], ['Guilty', ['Original Creator']]]
